scripts.build:all: pnpm version:update && pnpm build && tauri build
scripts.build:mac: pnpm version:update && pnpm build && tauri build --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.build:windows: pnpm version:update && pnpm build && tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.build:linux: pnpm version:update && pnpm build && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:linux-arm: pnpm version:update && pnpm build && tauri build --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.release: pnpm version:update && pnpm build && tauri build --config src-tauri/tauri.release.conf.json
scripts.version:bump: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const version = process.argv[1]; execSync(\`git tag v\${version}\`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log(\`Tag v\${version} criada!\`);"
